Jason Travis This is important enough to go above and beyond the minimum. October 23, 2011 is the deadline to have as many signatures as possible. It's simple, just register and click 'Sign This Petition'. Software is the only thing that is covered by both copyright and patents. A patent is designed to protect tangible innovations while copyright is designed to protect ideas.  Software Patents are a burden on the patent office who is obligated to churn out thousands of them every year. They are a burden on the legal system who must process thousands of incomprehensible legal suits. They are a burden on businesses that may not even produce software:   http://www.nytimes.com/‚Ä¶/ford-sued-over-patents-for-sync-co‚Ä¶  Just like taxes as they trickle down the hierarchy, one way or another, software patents are ultimately a burden on you too.

comments.content: Hi Aunt Loretta, things are going slow and steady. I'm studying Computer Science learning how to make computer programs and I've recently picked up an Electrical Engineering minor in Embedded Systems. It's more or less the same thing except it emphasizes details necessary for special purpose computers (ATMs, dishwashers, industrial control systems, thermostats, etc).
jason that is awesome.  You will have some wonderful oportunities when you are finished with school.  are you still living with you Dad? did the apt thing come thru yet?

It seems like yesterday, but my roommate and I moved into the new apartment on the 24th. It's comfortable and only a couple thousand feet away from the university. The hard part was figuring out how to get the furniture up the stairs.
oh boy....that's going to be fun.  What floor are you on?  dont tell me the 6th floor or something wild like that!
Second floor. The city limits building height so few are more than 3 or 4 floors.
thank goodness!  have fun and enjoy your new apt

description: Clare Hagearty Willis Finally the semester is over. And it really isn't that anyone said I couldn't do it, its just that I knew how hard it was going to be and I wasn't sure  I could do it. Nevertheless I showed up everyday and found some friends who helped me along.  Jason Travis   Josh Sommers   Antonio Rios  (The Great),        It Couldn‚Äôt Be Done  (Edgar Guest)  Somebody said that it couldn‚Äôt be done,      But, he with a chuckle replied  That "maybe it couldn‚Äôt," but he would be one      Who wouldn‚Äôt say so till he‚Äôd tried.  So he buckled right in with the trace of a grin      On his face. If he worried he hid it.  He started to sing as he tackled the thing      That couldn‚Äôt be done, and he did it.  Somebody scoffed: "Oh, you‚Äôll never do that;      At least no one has done it";  But he took off his coat and he took off his hat,      And the first thing we knew he‚Äôd begun it.  With a lift of his chin and a bit of a grin,      Without any doubting or quiddit,  He started to sing as he tackled the thing      That couldn‚Äôt be done, and he did it.  There are thousands to tell you it cannot be done,      There are thousands to prophesy failure;  There are thousands to point out to you one by one,      The dangers that wait to assail you.  But just buckle it in with a bit of a grin,      Just take off your coat and go to it;  Just start to sing as you tackle the thing      That "couldn‚Äôt be done," and you‚Äôll do it. Clare

description: Matthew John  is with  Kevin Gilbert  at  Standing Rock, ND . Please LIKE and SHARE because #WeAreTheMedia  UPDATE 1/24 TRUMP REVERSES ARMY CORPS   Trump directs the Army Corps of Engineers to "review and approve" the final steps in the construction process "in an expedited manner". [A] leading tribal organization dedicated to blocking further construction of the Dakota Access project, promised a new round of "massive mobilization and civil disobedience."   http://cnn.it/2jnK2AV  UPDATE 12/4 ARMY CORPS HALTS EASEMENT   http://nbcnews.to/2fYcxVn  A. HELP WATER PROTECTORS WINTERIZE  Send funds to the Oceti Sakowin Camp ( http://bit.ly/winter-camp-fund ), Standing Rock Sioux Tribe ( http://bit.ly/standing-rock-fund ), the Medic+Healer Council ( http://bit.ly/winter-medic-fund ), and the Waterkeeper Alliance ( http://bit.ly/water-keep-fund ).  B. FOLLOW REAL PEOPLE FOR COVERAGE  Get live local coverage by following Dallas Goldtooth and Myron Dewey and get summary videos like this one by following Matthew John ( http://bit.ly/matthew-john-page ). Follow Kevin Gilbertt ( http://bit.ly/kevin-gilbertt-live ) for live coverage elsewhere, as he is now traveling to other movements across the country. You can also follow a number of additional water protectors including Atsa E'sha Hoferer, Shiy√© Bidz√≠√≠l, Lucie Longtree, Bucky Harjo.   C. HELP COVER MEDICAL COSTS  Sophia Wilansky ( http://bit.ly/sofia-fund ) was giving out bottles of water to protectors holding down the space when she nearly lost her arm from an explosion. Vanessa Sioux Z ( http://bit.ly/vanessa-fund ) was on the front lines and shot in the eye with a tear gas canister. Donations will be used for the cost of the two ER visits, surgery, medications, and recovery.  D. VOLUNTEER WITH ON-SITE MEDICS  Educate yourself ( http://bit.ly/2g47DSW ) and apply online ( http://bit.ly/2gyoi4u ) as they need qualified medics, EMTs, nurses, physicians, herbalists, midwives, massage therapists through the winter ‚Äì and individuals who can help in supportive and logistical roles to process, sort and distribute supply donations!  E. DONATE MEDICAL SUPPLIES  See what supply kits are needed ( http://bit.ly/2fIDzi2 ) or donate items by mailing to the "Standing Rock Medic & Healer Council, PO Box 1251, Bismarck, ND, 58502" or if shipping via UPS or FedEx, use "220 E Rosser Ave #1251, Bismarck ND 58502" with shipping phone 701-409-0199.  F. FURTHER READING  Updates Since This Video Was Made   https://infinitecoop.github.io/oil-water-steel/index.html  Robert F. Kennedy Jr. On Obama's "No Brainer" DAPL Choice   http://bit.ly/2go7gDr  More detail on the big oil companies, banks, and the establishment.   http://bit.ly/2g4a9Za  Julie R. Heidlinger, a ND native, with her less-heard view of the protest   http://bit.ly/julie-on-dapl-protest  Morton County officials being sued for use of 'excessive force' against protesters   http://bit.ly/2fCPkbb  Largest bank in Norway pulls its assets in Dakota Access pipeline   http://bit.ly/2goaSp0  G. CONTACT OUR LEADERS  424-353-2016 Text NBC with your opinion  701-333-2006 National Guard Public Affairs  701-328-2200 ND Governor  701-328-4726 ND Attorney General  701-667-3330 Local Sheriff Office  202-456-1111 White House  202-456-9431 White House Situation Room  202-353-1555 DOJ comment line (no illegal sale of farms)  202-514-2000 DOJ switchboard (have police stand down)  H. DEFUND BANKS FINANCING THE PIPELINE   http://www.defunddapl.org  I. SIGN PETITIONS   http://standwithstandingrock.net/take-action/   https://www.change.org/p/stop-the-dakota-access-pipeline   https://www.change.org/p/jo-ellen-darcy-stop-the-dakota-acc‚Ä¶  J. SHARE THIS VIDEO ELSEWHERE  Share the youtube version of this video ( https://youtu.be/IOkYDH_VwNE ) or use this link ( http://bit.ly/standing-rock-truth ) to guide people to this video as a public Facebook post so people everywhere can see it.  #StandingRock #WaterProtectors #KeepItInTheGround #StandingWithStandingRock #TheWorldIsWatching #MniWiconi #WaterIsSacred #WaterIsLife #OcetiSakowinCamp #ShareWithPrayer #DefendTheSacred Indigenous Environmental Network Indigenous Rising Media Digital Smoke Signals The Young Turks Collective Evolution  K. SPECIAL THANKS  Thanks Kevin Gilbertt for being a stand, Valerie Silidker for posting resources, Kevin A. Walton, Daniela Salazar, Amy Mihelich, Rachel Shapiro, Amy Silverman, Jeska Brodbeck, Katherine Coder, Kelly Lynn Gitter, Alexandra Rose, Kino MacGregor, Tim Feldmann, Aaron Erickson, Patrick Kiebzak, Aubrey Haase, Casandra Bambol√™ Tanenbaum, Marisa Erin Silverman, Emily Andari, Karen Prosen, Jo Englesson and Francine Rahe for steady examples of authentic being, and Jon Stewart and John Oliver for ideas for a format.  L. UPDATE FROM COMMENTS  While the majority of protestors are peaceful, seems there are some groups who are purposefully escalating ‚Äî just like when civil rights leaders MLK Jr. and Gandhi held to nonviolence while other activists escalated beyond their vision. The goal of this post is discussion, and special thanks to Todd Sheldon, Francine Doe, Aj Baginski, Stacy Ashley, Bob Doug and others in the comments who are ensuring the full picture is shared.
